oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Crayon print of Nancy Taylor Kinzer
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Crayon print of Nancy Taylor Kinzer by John L. White Photography. Nancy was reportedly educated at the University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill. She married John Wesley Kinzer. Her brother, John Taylor, served in the Confederate Army at Shiloh. During the Civil War, she lived near Milan, Tenn. According to family lore, Nancy went to Shiloh to pick up her wounded brother. She brought him home on a flatbed train.
